Module neidische.narwale.hp
Package gamelogic.cards.damageCards

Class DamageCard

java.lang.Object
gamelogic.cards.Card
gamelogic.cards.damageCards.DamageCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
Spam, TrojanHorse, Virus, Worm
public abstract class DamageCard extends Card
The abstract class DamageCard represents all four damage cards
Author:
Hannah Spierer, Tim Kriegelsteiner
